title: Dorset & Hants Live: As it happened - BBC News
summary: two dead in nether wallop crash .
a30 reopens in dorset after four-vehicle crash .
storm-hit swimming pool in portsmouth remains closed .
about 100 homes were left without power in poole , bournemouth and petersfield .
southern rail `` running more trains '' during latest strike .

documents.title: that 's all for today !
text: the bbc local live service for hampshire , dorset and the isle of wight will resume at 08:00 on wednesday .
thanks for joining us and please do stay in touch by email , on our hampshire and dorset facebook pages or on twitter @ bbc hampshire and @ bbcdorset .

documents.title: weather outlook : turning drier
text: it will slowly turn drier overnight , although still rather cloudy with occasional scattered showers .
it may also turn foggy for some by dawn .
lows of about 6°c ( 42°f ) .
any showers will ease tomorrow to leave a generally cloudy day with a few brighter breaks .
it will stay cold though and perhaps turn breezier by the evening .
highs of 9°c ( 48°f ) .
for a full 10-day forecast , visit the bbc weather site .

documents.title: cyclist who died in a31 crash named as stephen turner
text: a cyclist who died in a crash on the a31 near four marks has been named .

stephen turner , 61 , of thorpe gardens , alton , was travelling along the dual carriageway at about 17:45 on friday when he was in a collision with a black peugeot 207 on the eastbound carriageway , police said .
he was pronounced dead at the scene .
the 62-year-old driver of the car was taken to basingstoke hospital with non life-threatening injuries .

documents.title: breakingtwo dead in nether wallop crash
text: two drivers have been killed in a crash between two vans on the a30 this morning near nether wallop in hampshire .
a 63-year-old male driver of a citroen van , who was from salisbury , and a 58-year-old male driver of a volkswagen van , who was from reading , were both pronounced dead at the scene .
investigations into the exact circumstances of the collision are ongoing .

we 're pleased to report officers have been contacted by a witness who has confirmed it was a prank .

documents.title: new ibm centre set to open in fareham
text: ibm has become the latest us technology firm to invest in the uk following the brexit vote by announcing the launch of four new cloud data centres .
the multimillion us dollar investment will increase the number of ibm cloud data centres in the uk from two to six , with the first new site set to open in fareham at the end of december .
the move comes after facebook , apple and google announced plans for new london headquarters .

documents.title: dorset travel latest : a30 closed - affecting traffic to and from sherborne
text: # traveldorsetalert : update : yeovil - a30 closed due to a collision - four vehicles involved between compton road and ratleigh road .

documents.title: 'no full investigation ' for southampton train derailment
text: rail accident investigators will not be conducting a full investigation into the derailment of a train in southampton earlier this month .
the charter train from london to fawley esso came off the tracks at southampton eastern docks on saturday 5 november .
the special 08:00 gmt service had been due to be the first direct service from waterloo .
no-one was injured .
the rail accident investigation branch ( raib ) said it would produce a `` safety digest '' instead of a full report .
author: Roz Tappenden
BBC South

documents.title: new river footbridge swings into place in wimborne
text: the new footbridge over the river allen in wimborne , to link crown mead shopping centre and the town centre with waitrose , has swung into place this morning .
work to construct the bridge began in september .
thanks to anthony oliver for these

documents.title: police unclear whether or not teenager put into car boot was a prank
text: a teenager is believed to have been grabbed by a man and put into the boot of his car in portsmouth , police have said .
however , police are unclear whether the `` sus incident '' was a prank , or if a crime had been committed .
it is alleged a car drove into penarth avenue , from havant road , between 17:00 and 17:30 on friday and pulled up on to the pavement in front of two youths , aged about 16 to 18 .
the teenagers ran across the road and the man who had been driving the car got out and grabbed one of the teenagers and put him in the boot of his car .
we have n't received a report by the victim or the other youth , no other witnesses have come forward and we do n't have any missing people in the area that would match the description of the youth .
our priority is to confirm the safety of the youths involved .

documents.title: 'boastful ' drug dealer jailed
text: a man who boasted making up to £ 1,500 a day from drug deals in winchester has been jailed for three years and two months .
connor lynch , 21 , of gladesmore road , tottenham , london , pleaded guilty to possessing heroin with intent to supply , on the first day of his trial at winchester crown court yesterday .
he was arrested in october 2015 when police raided an address in birch court , thurmond road , winchester .
the defence said lynch 's guilt became `` indisputable '' last week , when police downloaded boastful texts to women and of `` wads of cash '' from his mobile phone .

documents.title: examination into derailment at southampton
text: an examination has taken place following a charter passenger train derailment at southampton eastern docks earlier this month .
the rail accident investigation branch said a preliminary examination into the circumstances surrounding this accident on 5 november had been carried out .
having assessed the evidence it said it would publish a safety digest `` shortly '' .
more to follow .

documents.title: sinkhole closes road under railway
text: engineers are at the site of a sinkhole in poole which has forced the closure of a road on the harbour .
borough of poole council closed keyhole bridge in whitecliff road yesterday after the hole appeared .
the road links poole park and whitecliff park .
network rail said the railway was unaffected .
council engineers are expected to report on the depth of the hole later .

documents.title: watch : hundreds of starfish stranded on southsea beach
text: hundreds of starfish have been washed up on southsea beach during the stormy weather .
dislodged by rough seas , they have appeared on the shore near the pyramids centre following storm angus .

documents.title: southern 'providing more trains ' for latest rmt strike
text: southern rail passengers facing disruption from the latest rmt strike have been told 62 % of the normal timetable will be operating .
union members walked out for 48 hours at midnight in the long-running dispute over the role of conductors on trains .
southern said it was doing `` everything it could to provide as many services for passengers as possible '' .
one commuter tweeted his train was `` rammed '' , while another described the service as `` shambolic '' .

documents.title: hampshire travel latest : m3 and a32 delays
text: travel : gosport to fareham a32 northbound delay , 50 mins at the mo .
closed : the esplanade at # southsea seafront remains closed due to high winds
travel : hovertravel services resuming from ryde at 08.15 and southsea at 08.30 .
travel : accident m3 n'bound at j13 , eastleigh , already creating 20 min delays up from m27 at southampton & up out of soton from chilworth .

documents.title: storm-hit swimming pool remains closed
text: a seafront swimming pool flooded in the wake of storm angus wo n't reopen until thursday , its operators say .
water flooded portsmouth 's pyramids in the early hours of sunday , causing extensive damage .
bh live , which runs the centre , has apologised and said repairs were under way .
the gym , activity studio , soft play and care at the centre are open and can be accessed via the pool reception .

documents.title: fault cuts power to 100 homes
text: about 100 homes are without power in poole , bournemouth and petersfield .
scottish and southern energy power distribution said the power went off in the early hours .
the company said it had been caused by cable faults due to the stormy weather .
it said homes in poole and bournemouth were expected to be back on by 09:00 gmt , and by 12:00 in petersfield .

documents.title: heavy rain and strong winds warning
text: wind and rain will continue to batter parts of england and wales in the wake of storm angus , which has caused flash flooding and travel chaos .
the south west and north west of england and south wales have been hit by torrential downpours .
forecasters warned conditions were not set to improve until later this week .
further wet weather is expected to move north along with strong winds of up to 80mph .

documents.title: good morning
text: welcome to bbc local live for dorset , hampshire and the isle of wight on tuesday .
we 'll be bringing you the latest news from across the three counties .
you can get in touch by email , on our hampshire and dorset facebook pages or on twitter @ bbc hampshire and @ bbcdorset .
